field.name: summary
field.value: prevent Exception when passing a null dictionary as ComponentParameters of a ViewComponent

field.name: description
field.value:
Supplying the ComponentParameters to a view component via a "$" parameter or helper throws an exception if the dictionary is null. The error checking wrongly interprets the nullity of the parameter as a missing 'with' keyword.
The following examples should be entirely valid in a view:
#component(ComponentName $paramsDict) #component(ComponentName $myHelper.GetParamsDict())
even if the value of $paramDict or $myHelper.GetParamsDict() evaluate to null.
